You are a member of the old sect serving the god who freed the humans from vampire rule.
Some call him a demon, but that 'demon' has done much more for the people of Caripati peninsula than any other 'diety' that others falsely preach.
The betrayal of the human-ruled kingdom your god can hardly forgive, but there is a way you can pay him back.
*ï¸âƒ£ ALLIANCE OBJECTIVE: Summon your god
Your goal is to satisfy your god by performing rituals and ultimately sacrificing a person of high value to the kingdom.
You also want the queen dead for acting against your god.
How you plan to kill her is up to you, but you know that there are weapon vendors somewhere within the dark market.
You have to perform three ritual preparations, each on a whole hour (example: 9pm, 10pm, 11pm)
If you miss it, you have to perform it on the next half hour, or else the ritual is failed.
For each ritual preparation, you have to collect a purple candle and a magical essence.
The purple candles can be found around the tavern, but the magical essence might be a bit harder to get.
Try the dark market for it as well.
Each ritual preparation has to be done in a different room and the sect leader has to incantate three times: invoco propo saluto
Light the candle on fire and pour the essence around it. The preparation is then complete.
If all the preparations are completed, the god can be summoned by sacrificing the high value target.
Bring their dead body to one of the rooms with a candle and the sect leader has to incantate five times: invoco domino servio ultimano
The ritual is then complete, and the dead body is fully consumed for the summoning of your god.
